webDesign.infoPlan: suitable for a website with basic design and functionality to provide the basic information about your business or service
a website with a custom design and more sophisticated functionality. Suitable for larger businesses or those who want to stand out online
Ideal for large companies or online stores that need a multi-functional and complex website with a custom design, fully responsive for mobile devices and with multiple functionalities

webDevolmpent.infoPlan: up to 5 pages, mobile-optimized design, suitable for SMBs.
up to 10 pages, additional functionalities and a custom design suitable for larger companies.
up to 20 pages, custom design, social media integration and SEO optimization, best for online stores and large projects

webSupport.infoPlan: includes regular checking of functionality and design elements, as well as updating content according to your wishes
includes everything from the standard plan as well as personalized support and quick response to issues that may arise
is ideal for online stores and large projects, which includes personalized support, SEO optimization, fast response to issues and social media support

logoDesign.infoPlan: Professional logo development provided in various formats
Custom logo design service including unique identity, design options and up to 3 design revisions
Includes all the benefits of the premium package as well as additional unlimited revisions to meet the needs of companies looking for a visual identity

cardDesign.infoPlan: includes a sleek and professional design that will reflect your stylish presentation
Premium package offers a personalized design service with greater attention to detail and different design options
includes all the benefits of the premium package, plus unlimited revisions

python.paragraph_1: Курсът По Програмиране Е Структуриран В 5 Различни Модула, Като Всеки От Тях Е Насочен Към Различно Ниво На Знания В Програмирането. За Вас Сме Подготвили Следните Модули:
python.paragraph_2: Курсът Предлага Много Интересни И Страхотни Задачи За Всеки Модул, Чрез Които Ще Натрупате Ценни Знания В Областта На Програмирането. Всеки Модул Завършва С Подготовка На Портфолио От Проекти, Което Ще Ви Предостави Възможност Да Приложите Своите Знания В Практика. В Края На Курса Ще Получите Сертификат, Който Ще Доказва, Че Сте Участвали И Завършили Курса По Програмиране.

paragrahps.paragraph: Welcome to our business card design company! We offer innovative and creative solutions that will make your business card memorable and unique. We understand that every business has specific needs and identity, so we offer three plans - Standard , Premium and Business - to match your requirements and budget.

The Standard plan includes a basic business card design that reflects your core values and business identity. The Premium plan offers a more detailed design that includes additional visual elements and creative solutions. The Business plan offers a full suite of business card design services , including custom graphics, premium materials, and style and branding consulting.

Our services include business card design, branding consulting, custom graphics creation, and more. Our professional designers will work with you to understand your vision and translate it into a visually appealing and professional business card.

Our design experts are involved in every detail of the creation of your business card - from the color palette and typography to the choice of materials and the final execution. All our projects are made according to the latest trends in the field of graphic design
Contact us today to start creating your unique and professional business card that will help you stand out and leave a strong impression on your customers!

Welcome to our logo design company! We offer creative and unique solutions that will make your brand memorable. We understand that every organization has unique needs and identity, that's why we offer three plans - Standard, Premium and Business - to match your specific requirements and budget.

The Standard plan includes a basic logo design that reflects your core values and ideals. The Premium plan offers an advanced design that offers more opportunities for creativity and standing out. The Business plan includes a full logo design, with additional services including custom graphics, brand style consulting and personalization.
Our services include logo design, brand style consulting, custom graphics creation, and more. We will work with you to understand your vision and transform it into an expressive and unique logo.

Our professional designers are involved in every detail of creating your logo - from color palette and shape to typography and execution. All our projects are made according to the latest trends in graphic design.
Contact us today to start the process of creating a unique and memorable logo that will help your brand stand out and attract more customers!

Welcome to our web design services company! We offer professional design solutions that will make your online presence unforgettable. We understand that every business is unique and that's why we offer three plans - Standard, Premium and Business - so we can meet your individual needs and budget.

The Standard plan includes a basic website design that meets the basic needs of your business. The Premium plan includes a more advanced design that offers more options for personalization and visual appeal to customers. The Business plan includes a full design of website, with maximum possibilities for functionality and convenience for your customers.
Our services include website design, visual and graphic design, logo design, and other design services. We will work with you carefully to select the plan that meets your needs and preferences.

Our professional web designers will take care of every aspect of your website design, from the color palette and fonts to the layout of information. All our projects are made using the latest technologies and trends in web design .
Contact us today to start creating a unique and professional online presence that will help your business stand out from the competition and attract more customers!

Welcome to our web development company! We offer innovative technology solutions that will turn your vision into reality and enhance your online presence. We understand that every organization has unique needs, so we offer three plans - Standard , Premium and Business - to match your specific requirements and budget.

The Standard plan includes basic web development that meets the basic needs of your business. The Premium plan offers advanced functionalities and customization options to capture the interest of a larger audience. The Business plan covers a full range of services for web development, including advanced functionalities and customization options to provide the best user experience for your customers.

Our services include web development, programming, website maintenance and management, SEO optimization, mobile app development and much more. Our professional web developers will work with you from start to finish to ensure that the product meets your needs and expectations.

Our web development experts are dedicated to every element of creating your website, from architecture and navigation to functionality and performance. All our projects are developed using the latest technologies and practices in the field of web development.
Contact us today to start creating a strong and functional online presence that will contribute to the success of your business and help you always be one step ahead of the competition!

Welcome to our web support company! We offer effective solutions that will keep your website running smoothly and smoothly. We understand that every organization has unique needs, which is why we offer three plans - Standard, Premium and Business - to match your specific requirements and budget.

The Standard plan includes basic maintenance and updates to your website, ensuring the continuity of its operation. The Premium plan offers more services, including quick responses to problems, regular updates and more extensive technical support. The Business plan includes full website maintenance, with a first-class support service and making all necessary updates and changes.

Our web support professionals are committed to your success and take care of every aspect of maintaining your website - from its performance and security to its adaptability and speed. All of our projects are executed with an emphasis on the latest web industry standards and practices.

Contact us today to start keeping your website in top shape, ensuring it's always ready to meet your business needs and attract new customers. With our web maintenance services , you will always be one step ahead of the competition!

This Privacy Policy describes our policies and procedures regarding the collection, use and disclosure of your information when you use the Service, and tells you about your privacy rights and how the law protects you.
We use your personal data to provide and improve the Service. By using the Service, you consent to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.
Words beginning with a capital letter have the meanings specified in the following terms. The following definitions have the same meaning whether they appear in the singular or plural.

paragrahps.paragrahp: For the purposes of this Privacy Policy:

listparagraph.paragraph: means a unique account created for You to access our Service or parts of our Service.

means an entity that controls, is controlled by or is under common control with a party, where control means ownership of 50% or more of the stock, equity interest or other valuable papers that have the right to vote in the election of directors or other governing body.
(referred to as The Company , We, Us or Our in this Agreement) refers to SDM BG CONSULT OOD, SHUMEN, PL. MANURE 17.
are small files placed on your computer, mobile device or other device by a website containing details of your browsing history on that website among its many uses.
applies to: Bulgaria.
means any device that accesses the Service, such as a computer, mobile phone or digital tablet.
is any information that relates to an identified or identifiable natural person.
refers to the Website.

means any natural or legal person who processes data on behalf of the Company. It refers to third parties or persons employed by the Company to facilitate the Service, provide the Service on behalf of the Company, perform services related to the Service, or assist the Company in analyzing how the Service is used.
refers to data collected automatically or generated by the use of the Service or by the infrastructure of the Service itself (for example, the duration of a page visit).
refers to SDM BG CONSULT, accessible from
You means the individual accessing or using the Service, or the company or other legal entity on whose behalf such individual accesses or uses the Service, as applicable.

descriptions.title: Collection and Use of Your Personal Data - Types of Data Collected

paragrahps.paragrahp: While using our service, we may ask you to provide us with certain personal information that can be used to contact or identify you. Personal information may include, but is not limited to:

listparagraph.paragraph: Email address
First and last name
Phone number
Usage Data

paragrahps.paragrahp: Usage data is collected automatically when you use the Service.

Usage Data may include information such as your device's Internet Protocol address (eg, IP address), browser type, browser version, the pages of our Service you visit, the time and date of your visit, time spent on these pages, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data.

When you access the Service from or through a mobile device, we may collect certain information automatically, including, but not limited to, the type of mobile device you are using, the unique identifier of your mobile device, the IP address of your mobile device, your mobile operating system, the type of mobile internet browser you use, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data.
We may also collect information that your browser sends each time you visit our Service or when you access the Service from or through a mobile device.

We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our service and store certain information. The tracking technologies used are beacons, tags and scripts to collect and track information and to improve and analyze our service. The technologies we use may include:

listparagraph.paragraph: A cookie is a small file placed on your device. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some parts from our service. Unless you have adjusted your browser settings to refuse cookies, our service may use cookies.

Certain sections of our Service and our emails may contain small electronic files known as web beacons (also called clear gifs, pixel tags, and single pixel gifs) that allow the Company, for example, to count users , who visited those pages or opened an email and for other related website statistics (for example, recording the popularity of a certain section and checking the integrity of the system and server).

paragrahps.paragrahp: Cookies can be ' persistent' or 'session'. Persistent cookies remain on your PC or mobile device when you are offline, while session cookies are deleted as soon as you close your web browser.

listparagraph.paragraph: Session cookies
Us

paragrahps.paragrahp: These cookies are essential to provide you with services available through the website and to allow you to use some of its features. They help authenticate users and prevent fraudulent use of user accounts. Without these cookies the services you have requested cannot be provided and we only use these cookies to provide you with these services.

listparagraph.paragraph: Persistent cookies
Us

paragrahps.paragrahp: Purpose: These cookies identify whether users have accepted the use of cookies on the website.

listparagraph.paragraph: Persistent cookies
Us

paragrahps.paragrahp: Purpose: These cookies allow us to remember the choices you make when using the website, such as remembering your login details or language preferences. The purpose of these cookies is to provide you with a more personal experience and avoid the need to re-enter your preferences each time you use the website
For more information about the cookies we use and your choices about cookies, please visit our Cookie Policy or the Cookies section of our Privacy Policy.
The Company may use Personal Data for the following purposes:

listparagraph.strong: To provide and maintain our Service
listparagraph.paragraph: including to monitor the use of our Service
to manage your registration as a user of the Service. The personal data you provide may give you access to various functionalities of the Service that are available to You as a registered user.
the development, performance and acceptance of the contract for the purchase of the products, items or services you have purchased or any other contract with Us through the Service.

To contact you via email, phone calls, SMS or other equivalent forms of electronic communication, such as targeted mobile application notifications about updates or informational messages related to the functionalities, products or contracted services, including security updates when necessary or reasonable for their performance.

news, special offers and general information about other goods, services and events we offer that are similar to those you have already purchased or inquired about , unless you have opted out of receiving such information.
To attend and manage your requests to us.

We may use your information to evaluate or conduct a merger, sale, restructuring, reorganization, liquidation or other sale or transfer of some or all of our assets, whether whether as a going concern or as part of a bankruptcy, liquidation, or similar proceeding in which Personal Data held by Us about users of Our Services is among the transferred assets.

We may use your information for other purposes, such as analyzing data, identifying usage trends, determining the effectiveness of our promotional campaigns, and to evaluate and improve of our Service, products, services, marketing and your experience.

paragrahps.paragrahp: We may share your personal information in the following situations:

listparagraph.paragraph: We may share your personal information with service providers to monitor and analyze your use of our service to contact you.

We may share or transfer your personal information in connection with or during negotiations for any merger, sale of company assets, financing or acquisition of all or part of our business to another company.

We may share your information with our partners, in which case we will require those affiliates to comply with this Privacy Policy. Affiliates include Our parent company and any other subsidiaries companies, joint venture partners or other companies that We control or that are under common control with Us.
We may share your information with our business partners to offer you certain products, services or promotions.
when you share personal information or otherwise interact in public areas with other users, that information may be viewed by all users and may be publicly distributed externally.
We may disclose your personal information for any other purposes with your consent.

paragrahps.paragrahp: The Company will only retain your personal data for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy. We will retain and use your personal data to the extent necessary to comply with our legal obligations (for example, if we are required to retain your data to comply with applicable laws), resolve disputes and enforce our legal agreements and policies.

The Company will also retain Usage Data for internal analysis purposes. Usage Data is generally retained for a shorter period of time, except when such data is used to strengthen security or improve the functionality of our service, or we are legally required to retain this data for longer periods of time.

Your information, including Personal Data, is processed at the Company's operational offices and at all other locations where the parties involved in the processing are located. This means that this information may be transferred to — and maintained at — computers located outside of your state, province, country or other governmental jurisdiction where data protection laws may differ from those in your jurisdiction.
Your acceptance of this Privacy Policy, followed by the submission of such information, constitutes your consent to this transfer.

The Company will take all steps reasonably necessary to ensure that your data is treated securely and in accordance with this Privacy Policy and there will be no transfer of your personal data to an organization or country unless adequate control measures are in place, including the security of your data and other personal information.
You have the right to delete or request that we assist in the deletion of Personal Data we have collected about you.
Our Service may give you the opportunity to delete certain information about you from the Service.

You may update, change, or delete your information at any time by logging into your account, if you have one, and visiting the account settings section that allows you to manage your personal information. You may also contact us to request access to, correction or deletion of personal information you have provided to us.
Please note, however, that we may need to retain certain information where we have a legal obligation or legal basis to do so.

listparagraph.paragraph: If the Company is involved in a merger, acquisition, or asset sale, your personal information may be transferred. We will provide notice before your personal information is transferred and become subject to a different Privacy Policy.
Under certain circumstances, the Company may be required to disclose your personal data if required by law or in response to valid requests by public authorities ( eg a court or government agency).
The Company may disclose your Personal Data in the good faith belief that such action is necessary to:
Comply with legal obligation
Protection and Protection of Company's Rights or Property
Preventing or investigating possible wrongdoing in connection with the Service
Protecting the Personal Safety of Users of the Service or the Public
Protection against legal liability

paragrahps.paragrahp: The security of your personal data is important to Us, but please remember that no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. Although we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect Your personal data, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

paragrahps.paraItems: Our Service does not address anyone under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from anyone under the age of 13. If you are a parent or guardian and you know that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us. If we learn that we have collected personal information from a person under the age of 13 without verifying parental consent, we take steps to remove that information from our servers.
If we must rely on consent as a legal basis to process your information and your country requires parental consent, we may require your parent's consent before we collect and use that information.

Our Service may contain links to other websites that are not operated by us. If you click on a third party link, you will be directed to that third party's site. We strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of every site you visit.
We have no control over and are not responsible for the content, privacy policies, or practices of third-party sites or services.
We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
We will notify you via email and/or a clear notice on our Service before the change becomes effective and update the Last Updated date at the top of this Privacy Policy.
You are advised to periodically review this Privacy Policy for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page.

paragrahps.paragrahp: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, you can contact us:

listparagraph.strong: By visiting this page on our website:

paragrahps.paraItems: These are the Terms and Conditions governing the use of this Service and the agreement between you and the Company. These Terms and Conditions set out the rights and obligations of all users with respect to the use of the Service.

Your access to and use of the Service is conditioned on your acceptance of and compliance with these Terms and Conditions. These Terms and Conditions apply to all visitors, users and others who access or use the Service.
By accessing or using the Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these Terms and Conditions, then you may not access the Service.
You represent that you are over the age of 18. The Company does not permit persons under the age of 18 to use the Service.

Your access to and use of the Service is also subject to your acceptance of and compliance with the Company's Privacy Policy. Our Privacy Policy describes our policies and procedures regarding the collection, use and disclosure of your personal information when you use the Application or the Website and tells you about your privacy rights and how the law protects you. Please read our Privacy Policy carefully before using our service.
Our Service may contain links to third-party websites or services that are not owned or controlled by the Company.

Company has no control over and assumes no responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of any third-party websites or services. You further acknowledge and agree that Company shall have no responsibility or liability, directly or indirectly, for damages or losses caused or alleged to be caused by or in connection with the use or reliance on such content, goods or services available on or through such websites or services.
We strongly advise you to read the terms and privacy policies of any third-party websites or services you visit.
We may terminate or suspend your access immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason, including without limitation, if you violate these Terms and Conditions.
Upon termination, your right to use the Service will terminate immediately.

The laws of the country, excluding its conflict of laws rules, will govern these Terms and your use of the Service. Your use of the Application may be subject to other local, state, national or international laws.
If you have a concern or dispute regarding the Service, You agree to first try to resolve the dispute informally by contacting the Company.
If you are a user from the European Union, you will benefit from all mandatory provisions of the law of the country in which you reside.

You represent and warrant that (i) you are not located in a country that is embargoed by the United States Government or that is designated by the United States Government as a terrorist supporting country, and ( ii) you are not on the United States government's list of prohibited or restricted countries.

If any provision of these Terms is held to be unenforceable or invalid, such provision shall be modified and construed to achieve the purposes of such provision to the fullest extent possible under applicable law, and the remaining provisions shall continue be in full force and effect.

Except as provided herein, failure to exercise a right or require performance of an obligation under these Terms shall not affect a party's ability to exercise such right or require such performance at any time thereafter, nor shall the waiver of a breach constitutes a waiver of any subsequent breach.
These Terms and Conditions may have been translated if we have made them available to you on our Service. You agree that the original English text prevails in the event of a dispute.

descriptions.title: Changes to these Terms and Conditions

paragrahps.paraItems: We reserve the right, in our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If the revision is material, we will use reasonable efforts to provide at least 30 days' notice before the new terms become effective. What constitutes a material change will be determined at our sole discretion.

By continuing to access or use our Service after such revisions become effective, You agree to be bound by the revised terms. If you do not agree to the new terms, in whole or in part, please stop use the Website and the Service.

paragrahps.paraItems: Last updated: 02 Jun 2023.

This Cookie Policy explains what cookies are and how we use them. You should read this policy to understand what type of cookies we use or the information we collect using cookies and how that information is used.

Cookies generally do not contain any information that personally identifies the user, but the personal information we store about you may be linked to information stored in and obtained from Cookies. For more information about how we use we store and protect your personal data, see our Privacy Policy.
We do not store sensitive personal information such as mailing addresses, account passwords, etc. in the cookies we use.
Words beginning with a capital letter have the meanings specified in the following terms. The following definitions have the same meaning whether they appear in the singular or plural.

paragrahps.paragrahp: For the purposes of this Cookie Policy:

listparagraph.paragraph: (referred to as The Company , We, Us or Our in this Cookie Policy) refers to SDM BG CONSULT OOD, SHUMEN, OBORISHTE square 17.
means small files placed on your computer, mobile device or other device by a website containing details of your browsing history on that website among its many uses.
refers to SDM BG CONSULT, accessible from
means the individual who accesses or uses the Website, or a company or any legal entity on whose behalf such person accesses or uses the Website, as applicable.

paragrahps.paragrahp: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our service and store certain information. The tracking technologies used are beacons, tags and scripts to collect and track information and to improve and analyze our service. The technologies we use may include:

listparagraph.paragraph: A cookie is a small file placed on your device. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some parts from our service. Unless you have adjusted your browser settings to refuse cookies, our service may use cookies.

Certain sections of our Service and our emails may contain small electronic files known as web beacons (also called clear gifs, pixel tags, and single pixel gifs) that allow the Company, for example, to count users , who visited those pages or opened an email and for other related website statistics (for example, recording the popularity of a certain section and checking the integrity of the system and server).

paragrahps.paragrahp: Cookies can be ' persistent' or 'session'. Persistent cookies remain on your PC or mobile device when you are offline, while session cookies are deleted as soon as you close your web browser.

listparagraph.paragraph: Session cookies
Us

paragrahps.paragrahp: These cookies are essential to provide you with services available through the website and to allow you to use some of its features. They help authenticate users and prevent fraudulent use of user accounts. Without these cookies the services you have requested cannot be provided and we only use these cookies to provide you with these services.

listparagraph.paragraph: Persistent cookies
Us

paragrahps.paragrahp: Purpose: These cookies identify whether users have accepted the use of cookies on the website.

listparagraph.paragraph: Persistent cookies
Us

paragrahps.paragrahp: Purpose: These cookies allow us to remember the choices you make when using the website, such as remembering your login details or language preferences. The purpose of these cookies is to provide you with a more personal experience and avoid the need to re-enter your preferences each time you use the website
For more information about the cookies we use and your choices about cookies, please visit our Cookie Policy or the Cookies section of our Privacy Policy.

If you prefer to avoid the use of cookies on the website, you must first disable the use of cookies in your browser and then delete the cookies saved in your browser related to this website. You can use this option to prevent of the use of cookies at any time.
If you do not accept our cookies, you may experience some inconvenience when using the website and some features may not function properly.
If you wish to delete cookies or instruct your web browser to delete or refuse cookies, please visit your web browser's help pages.
